resource.title: Who is Srila Prabhupada
resource.content_text:
Be in the association of Srila Prabhupada. Always.
The verdict of all revealed scriptures is that by even a moment’s association with a pure devotee, one can attain all success. (CC Madhya 22.54)

resource.title: Biography
resource.content_text:
Acharya - One who teaches by example
The life of a pure devotee as a treat to our eyes.

resource.title: Disappearance Lila
resource.content_text:
I will never die. I will live forever in my books
He reasons ill who tells that Vaisnavas die When thou art living still in sound! The Vaisnavas die to live, and living try To spread the holy name around!

resource.title: Memories
resource.content_text:
Be in the association of Srila Prabhupada. Always.
The verdict of all revealed scriptures is that by even a moment’s association with a pure devotee, one can attain all success. (CC Madhya 22.54)

resource.title: Quotes
resource.content_text:
Vani, or the words of the spiritual exists with us eternally
guru-mukha-padma-vakya, cittete koriya aikya, ar na koriho mane asa
- My only wish is to have my consciousness purified by the words emanating from his lotus mouth.
–Guru vandana

resource.title: Prabhupada Analogies
resource.content_text:
Experience through examples
Srila Prabhupada brings us the knowledge of the Vedic literatures with his hard hitting analogies.

resource.title: Rare Pictures
resource.content_text:
A picture speaks a thousand words. And that of a pure devotee, limitless.
My dear Vaisnava, seeing a person like you is the perfection of one's eyesight
- Hari-bhakti-sudhodaya (13.2)

resource.title: Eulogies By Eminent
resource.content_text:
The glories of a pure devotee are inexhaustible.
ebe jasa ghusuk tribhuvana
May your glories now be proclaimed throughout the three worlds.
-Guru Vandana

resource.title: Predictions
resource.content_text:
Prabhupada's arrival has impacted the minds of scholars and devotees even before he actually advented.
“ A religion from the East will move the West” –Nostradamus, 16th century French apothecary and seer

resource.title: Quick Facts
resource.content_text: Facts about Prabhupada that can quickly sweep you off your feet.

resource.title: Voyage Of Compassion
resource.content_text: Reminisce Prabhupada’s journey to the West aboard the Jaladuta, the epitome of a pure devotee’s compassion. Memories and anecdotes connected to Prabhupada’s legendary voyage

resource.title: 108 Temples
resource.content_text:
The glories of a pure devotee are inexhaustible.
ebe jasa ghusuk tribhuvana
May your glories now be proclaimed throughout the three worlds.
-Guru Vandana

resource.title: Poetry by Prabhupada
resource.content_text:
Prabhupada’s ballads of bhakti
One of the qualities of a pure devotee is that he is a kavi.

resource.title: Poetry for Prabhupada
resource.content_text: Devotees sing the glories of Srila Prabhupada
